skills.name: MUTE
desc: • Deals true damage to all enemies.
• 25% Chance to Silence enemies for 1 turn.
• Damage dealt increases based on the enemy’s MAX HP.

skills.name: SOAR
desc: • Remove Negative Effects from target ally.
• 35% Chance for ally to gain an Extra Turn.
• An Extra Turn will let a character attack again if they’ve already acted that turn.

skills.name: GUARDIAN
desc: Cannot be Stunned, Taunted, Slept, or Frozen (including by unblockable Freeze).
